description.value:
Beginning at 2nd level, when you use a druid spell to heal one or more creatures, those creatures gain temporary hit points equal to 1d4 + your Wisdom modifier if they have more than half of their maximum hit points. These temporary hit points remain until the affected creature completes a short or long rest.

Additionally, when you deal fire or radiant damage with a druid spell, you gain temporary hit points equal to 1d4 + your Wisdom modifier.

The number of temporary hit points gained in both instances increases to 1d6 + your Wisdom modifier when you reach 5th druid level, 1d8 + your Wisdom modifier when you reach 11th druid level, and 1d10 + your Wisdom modifier when you reach 17th druid level.
